statements: SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData;
SELECT company_name, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData;
SELECT id, company_name, trading_strategy FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT company_name, entry_point, exit_point FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE trading_strategy = 'Long Term';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT company_name, risk_score, trading_strategy FROM RiskAssessmentData ORDER BY risk_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, trading_strategy, entry_point, exit_point FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id
SELECT AVG(risk_score) AS average_risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE entry_point < exit_point
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData;
SELECT stock_symbol, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM TradingStrategies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, timestamp FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, description FROM TradingStrategies WHERE parameters->>'type' = 'trend_following' ORDER BY created_on ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND risk_score < 0.3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TradingStrategies;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData;
SELECT stock_symbol, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY risk_tolerance DESC;
SELECT model_name, layers FROM NeuralNetworkModels WHERE layers > 3;
SELECT stock_symbol, risk_score, date_assessed FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, stock_symbol, risk_score, date_assessed FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY date_assessed DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT model_name, layers, activation_function FROM NeuralNetworkModels WHERE layers >= 3 AND activation_function = 'ReLU';
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Swing%' AND risk_tolerance < 0.3;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE date_assessed >= '2022-01-01' AND date_assessed <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData
SELECT id, date, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5
SELECT asset_name, risk_description FROM RiskAssessmentData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM NeuralNetworkStrategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Strategy A'
SELECT strategy_name, layers FROM NeuralNetworkStrategies ORDER BY layers DESC
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData
SELECT id, risk_score, asset_name FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY risk_score DESC
SELECT asset_name, risk_description FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, layers, activation_function FROM NeuralNetworkStrategies
SELECT * FROM TradingAssets WHERE current_price > 100 ORDER BY market_cap DESC
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_score > 0.75;
SELECT neural_id, neural_name, layers FROM neural_networks ORDER BY layers DESC;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_type, quantity FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, quantity, performance FROM trade_history WHERE performance < 0 ORDER BY performance ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL' AND risk_score > 0.8;
SELECT neural_id, neural_name, activation_function FROM neural_networks WHERE layers > 3;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_type='BUY' ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT t.stock_symbol, th.executed_date, th.performance FROM trades t INNER JOIN trade_history th ON t.trade_id = th.trade_id ORDER BY th.performance DESC LIMIT 5;
